content: Multipurpose reciprocating saw blades Bimetal reciprocating saw blades for cutting metal, wood and other materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Economical and versatile bimetal blades suitable for a wide range of materials Optimized for high-speed cutting through all compatible materials Thin kerf for more flexibility – the ideal blade for flush cuts Multiple lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Faster, general-purpose cutting Cutting wood Cutting various metals Cutting plastic Cutting metal-embedded wood ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 10-14 Technical Data | Product Class | Standard | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 10-14 | Blade features | Economic, Flexible ### ITEMS- 2222117 - Recip. saw blade P 6 1014 (5) univ - Package Size 5 pc - 2222118 - Recip. saw blade P 6 1014 (45) univ - Package Size 45 pc - 2221954 - Recip. saw blade P 8 1014 (5) univ - Package Size 5 pc - 2222119 - Recip. saw blade P 8 1014 (45) univ - Package Size 45 pc
